import React from 'react' import Checkbox from './Checkbox'; const ProductSideBar = ({ departmentSelector, setDepartmentSelector, starSelector, setStarSelector, priceSelector, setPriceSelector }) => { const handleFilterChange = (e) => { const { value } = e.target; (starSelector.includes(value)) ? setStarSelector(starSelector.filter((f) => f !== value)) : setStarSelector([...starSelector, value]) } console.log(starSelector) return (
